document_data.name: ''Tempertuppin's Ever-Thrower''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Tempertuppin's Ever-Throwers''''' were [[enchanted]] [[sling]]s that magically produced their own [[bullet]]s.
document_data.Powers: ''Tempertuppin's Ever-Throwers'' possessed a ''+1'' enchantment, and similarly to the weapon that inspired them, magically materialized bullets that were engulfed in flames and exploded upon reaching the target.
document_data.History:
These slings were created by [[Bindle Tempertuppin|Bindle "Eye-nock" Tempertuppin]], who claimed he witnessed a [[fire giant]] using a similar weapon but  "big enough to throw a [[donkey]] 300 paces". He, however, did not appreciate anyone questioning this and usually responded humorously with "you'll be sorry when a giant puts YOUR ass in a sling."

By the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], Tempertuppin's slings could be found in [[Neverwinter]] and the [[Moonsea]] region.
